text: Excellent service! The e-pharmacy platform is easy to use, and the home delivery is fast and reliable. It’s a huge convenience to get my medications delivered right to my doorstep. Highly recommended for anyone looking for safe and hassle-free access to medicines!

Very convenient, fast and efficient service. Team responds quickly to messages over WhatsApp and medicines get delivered straight to your home.

They even picked up the doctor's prescription directly from the doctor clinic. Highly recommend!
Such a convenient service! I’ve been using it for quite some time now when I run out of doctor’s medication. Prices are affordable and responses are swift!

Glovida was super efficient and quick in sending over the probiotics we ordered that we needed to travel with. Pharmacist was quick to confirm the delivery and it arrived by midday. Really appreciated the ease and efficiency.

Amazing transaction and service

1. Needed a medicine and did not have the needful prescription. They quickly arranged for a tele consultation for me. Great, they did not brush me off but listened to my needs.

2. Though I did not see them face to face, I could sense their sincerity to help, service and listen. Doctor Nick, staff in this transaction.

3.i have sent the order and made the payment after the cut off time. They knew I needed the medicine. They made some exception for me. I received the medicine on the same day.

I definitely recommend this service.
